gcig pa paN chen thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni /

yum mtsho lcam gnyis kyi sras su me mo yos kyi lo'i sa ga zla ba'i tshes bco lnga'i snga dro'i dus su khye'u mdog dkar zhing lta na sdug pa zhig 'khrungs /
lo gcig lhag tsam lon pa'i tshe yab de myos 'gyur gyi dbang du song nas mi gcig dmar gsod byas 'phral lag pa khrag can gyis khye'u la 'jus pa na grib phog ste sku grongs /
de nas lcags pho rta'i lor yab yum de gnyis la slar yang gnas g.yar te khye'u zhig 'khrungs /
mtshan chos rgyal dpal ldan bzang por gsol /
dgung lo bcu gsum pa la mkhas grub sangs rgyas ye shes kyi drung du dge tshul gyi sdom pa nod de mtshan blo bzang chos kyi rgyal mtshan du btags /
bla ma de nyid kyi drung du gsang 'dus kyi dbang sogs chos bka' mang du gsan /

de nas lha mo dbyangs can ma'i bsnyen pa zhag bdun mdzad pas lha mo nyid kyi zhal dngos su gzigs /
gzigs snang dang mthun pa'i bstod pa sho lo ka bcu bdun skor yod pa zhig thogs med du gsar rtsom mdzad /
khyad par zhal gzigs pa'i dbyangs can ma de'i thugs ka nas /
lha mo dbyangs can ma sngon mo phyag gnyis rin po che'i yol go /
dngos grub gzugs can lta bu'i shing tog gsar bas bkang ba zhig thon te phyag mtshan snod bcud dang bcas pa gtso mo la phul ba /
gtso mo'i phyag g.yas su bzhes pa'i shing tog gi 'bru gcig las dbyangs can ma dmar mo zhig thon byung ba des /
gtso mo'i phyag nas shing tog snod dang bcas pa blangs te rje nyid la phul byung ba longs sbyad pas /
blo gros nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgo thog mar phye ba'i tshul bstan /
de rjes lam rim 'bring po thugs 'dzin mdzad nas /
zhag bcu skor song mtshams lam rim che ba zhig gzigs pas thugs shin tu 'gro ba byung /
de'i nub mo bdag cag gi ston pa'i sku ri bo ltar che zhing brjid pa lta bas chog mi shes pa /
'od zer nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya 'phro ba zhig zhal gzigs shing lam rim che ba'ang thugs 'dzin mdzad /
dgung lo bcu bdun bzhes pa na bkra shis lhun por byon te mtshan nyid kyi phyogs la gsan sbyong mdzad pas tshig don mtha' dag thugs su chud de rigs pa smra ba'i dbang bor gyur /

bar skabs shig rgyal ba yon tan rgya mtsho zhi bar gshegs stabs dbus phyogs su dge lugs kyi bstan pa cung zad nyams dma' bar gyur pa na /

bka' chos zhu mi byings dang bcas par ma gcig dpal lha dang mgon po phyag bzhi pa'i rjes gnang stsal /

dngul gzhong dang bcas pa der 'jog pa mdzad /

kha sang sngon du bde mchog gi dbang gnang skabs chos thun ma grol gyi bar du rje bla ma nyid dpal 'khor lo sdom pa yab yum gyi rnam par bzhengs te dbang bskur ba'i snang ba byung ba bka' drin mchog tu che zhing /
yang nyin gcig rje bla ma mchog nas bka' chos gnang ba'i mur spyan chab mang po bsil song ba de skabs gzigs snang khyad par can zhig byung ba gdon mi za bas ji ltar byung tshul sba gsang med par lhug stsol gnang dgos zhes zhu ba mdzad pa'i lan du /

dpal 'khor chos sde'i mkhan tshab dang grwa tshang bla ma sogs rgyal rtse khul gyi ser skya mang po phebs bsur 'byor par mjal kha gnang ba dang bstun skye bo stong phrag skor la phyag dbang stsal /
tshes bcu gsum nyin bsu ba ser sbreng dang bcas brag khugs klu sdings su zhabs zung bkod /
gnyer pa nas kyang bsnyen bkur gzabs /
rgyal rtse khul gyi chibs bsu ba mang po dang /
bro gzhas pa /
ser sbreng pa bcas nas mdun bsus te dpal 'khor chos sde'i 'du khang chen mor spyan drangs /
mkhan tshab dka' bcu blo gros kyis dkar spro'i thog dngos 'bul dang grwa tshang khag nas kyang 'bul tshan phul zhing grwa mang la phyag dbang stsal /
bla brang dkar por bzhugs stan 'jags /
de'i phyi nyin 'du khang chen mor dge 'dun stong phrag brgal bar sman bla'i cho ga rgyas pa'i ljags lung dang /
mang ja bcu bzhi'i thog grwa grangs chig stong nyis brgya dgu bcu go bzhi la 'gyed dngul bal Tam gnyis re dang 'bru mkhar khal gnyis re /
bsngo rten rnam gzhag bcas stsal /
zhi gnas grwa tshang bas sger mjal zhus /
lho pa'i mgo pa skyid bde sbug pas bka' 'gyur yongs rdzogs phul /
mda' dpon lcang lo can pa dang rgyal rtse rdzong dpon nas dkar spro'i bsnyen bkur dang dngos 'bul gzab cing /
de bstun phreng ring skyong nas dang snang dkar ba sogs kyis dngos 'bul bstar zhing mjal kha zhus /
ser skya stong phrag mang por phyag dbang stsal /
de nas gnas gzigs la phebs te thub pa'i snang brnyan byang chub chen por mchod tshogs dang snyan shal /
gzhan ma rten rnams la'ang snyan shal dang /
gur mgon la spyan gzigs bcas phul /
gtsug lag khang dang sku 'bum gyi rten rnams zhib tu mjal nas phyag nas gnang zhing thugs smon mdzad /
der 'dus skye bo rnams nas snga sor paN chen sku gong ma rje btsun blo bzang ye shes kyis nyang stod 'di zhabs @# / /
kyis bcags pa zhig ma byung 'dug rung /
da lam mchog sprul thams cad mkhyen pa 'di nyid chibs kyi kha lo bskyod de zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dngos su mjal ba'i skal bzang thob pa 'di bka' blon dga' bzhi gung khong rang gi thugs rje yin zhes gleng ba'ang byung /
tshes bco lnga'i snga dro dpal 'khor chos sde'i 'du khang chen mor dge 'dun gyi tshogs dbur byon te gso sbyong mdzad /
bde yangs su gos sku chen mo la shis brjod gnang /
de nas bka'i dgung blon dga' bzhi gung paN+Di ta nas bsu ba ser sbreng bro gzhas dar 'phyar dung 'bud sogs bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas gzims khang du spyan drangs /
gsol ston gzab gshom sogs bsnyen bkur rgya chen po dang khyad par srad rgyud bla grwa dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis sbyan 'dren khrus gsol sogs zhal 'don gyi rim pa mdzad rjes maN+Dal /
sku gsung thugs rten /
na bza' nyer spyad /
dngul rdo tshad sum cu sogs kyi dngos 'bul bteg nas gung paN+Di ta rang nyid kyis gsol ba 'debs pa mdzad /
de'i phyi nyin yang gsol ston gya nom pa sogs bsnyen bkur gzab /
yul khams su bkra shis dge mtshan phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ched gso sbyong gi bskul ma mdzad par brten rje bla ma mchog gis gtso mdzad srad rgyud bla grwa dang rgyang ro gser sdings pa /
ser khang 'og ma ba /
mgon khang ba sogs nye skor dge 'dun gyi tshogs dang bcas bkra shis kyi gso sbyong mdzad /
nyi lde sprul sku dang rtse chen chos sde bas kyang dngos 'bul bteg /
de nas sku gsung thugs kyi rten gsar rnying rnams dang gzims khang skor la phyag nas dgos tshul gsol bar shis pa brjod pa'i me tog gi char phabs /
sku ngo rnams la slog cha gnang skyes sbam mtho ba stsal /
tshes bcu bdun la chibs skyel ba dang bcas sde ba 'brong rtse ba'i khang par zhag gcig bzhugs stan 'jags /
khong ba nas dkar spro dang dngos 'bul gyi bdog pa bteg /
'brong rtse chos sdeb dang skyid sbug pa| theg mchog gling pa bcas kyi spyi 'bul bstabs /
sde pa 'brong rtse pa dpon g.yog dang 'brong rtse chos sde'i grwa mang bcas la bla ma mchod pa dang gdugs dkar gyi ljags lung gnang rjes dmangs mar mjal kha gnang /
de'i phyi nyin chibs kha bsgyur te nub gling du tsha bab /
de nas mkhas grub thams cad mkhyen pa'i gdan sa khyad par can ri bo mdangs can du gnas gzigs kyi ched zhabs kyi padmo bkod de zhag gnyis bzhugs stan 'jags /
tshes bcu dgu'i nyin ri bo mdangs can spyi sa nas dkar spro dang dngos 'bul bcas brtan bzhugs phul /
dge 'dun la 'bul slog dang /
mang ja brgya tham pa'i dgos cha /
'gyed grwa rer bkras btags skya chen re dang dngul srang re /
snyan shal /
rnam gzhag bcas stsal /
grang mo che ba sogs kyis kyang sger mjal zhus /
mkhas grub rje'i snang brnyan gyi mdun du sna lnga'i mchod pa dang mchod rdzas snyan shal bcas phul /

gzigs /
mchod 'bul /
snyan shal bcas phul te thugs smon dang 'phrin bcol mdzad /

ri bo mdangs can pa dang grang mo che ba /

chos skyong byang bdud pa'i gtor 'bul sogs kyi ljags lung stsal /

de nas mtshan sgrog dga' ldan dar rgyas gling pa dang /
mda' dpon pad tshal ba /
rdzong yong sogs pa nam khul lha sde mi sde'i chibs bsu dang ser sbreng /
bro gzhas sogs kyis mdun bsus te lcang mgor bzhugs zhag sar zhabs zung bkod /

mtshan sgrog pa dang /
'bi lung ri khrod kyi dge 'dun rnams dang bcas mda' dpon nas dngos 'byor gyi mchod sprin spros te zhabs brtan phul bar slog cha yang mi dman pa stsal /

rdo rje phag mo'i rjes gnang stsal /
phyag mdzod chen mo nas khur bzhes te gser zangs kyi rgyal mtshan khyad du 'phags pa gsar bskrun mdzad pa gzungs gzhug gis bkang ste zla ba bcu pa'i tshes brgyad la gzims khang gi steng du 'dzugs pa mdzad /
de nas tshes dgu'i nyi shar nas bzung zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshes lnga'i bar sku mtshams mdzad nas dpal phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen sgrub la thugs brtson che ba gnang /
sku mtshams grol nas mtshan nyid zhabs phyi lho pa dka' chen zhabs drung yon tan rgyal mtshan shar rtse grwa tshang gi bla mar bsko bzhag mdzad de tshe 'di'i snang shas kyi dbang du ma song bar bstan pa'i zhabs tog tu 'chad nyan dmar ba byed dgos pa'i bka' phebs /
rje bla ma rang nyid la thugs 'dun yod pa'i khar bstan pa'i gsal byed lcang skya rin po che nas sngon du bskul ma mdzad pa'i don bzhin sngags grwar bde mchog gi cho ga 'dzugs par bzhed nas sngags pa grwa tshang du phebs /
bla ma las sne dge bshes rnams sku mdun du pos nas bde mchog gi cho ga phyag len 'don rta dbyangs sogs la dogs gcod mdzad /
bde mchog lU i pa'i snang brnyan li ma byin can gcig /
de'i dkyil thad bcas sngags grwa'i rten du sbyor 'jags gnang /
lo de'i zla ba bcu gcig pa'i tshes bcu gsum gza' skar 'phrod sbyor dge ba'i nyin nas bzung rje nyid kyis gtso mdzad sngags pa tshogs yongs nas zhag bdun gyi ring dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lU i pa'i lugs kyi sgrub mchod rgyal ba gnyis pa yab sras kyi dgongs bzhed ltar 'dzugs par mdzad pas gdan sa chen por ma rgyud kyi bstan pa'i snying po nam yang mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur /
skabs der bla brang nas thugs khur bzhes te zhabs tog phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs shing dpa' po mkha' 'gro rnams dga' ba'i mtshan ltas kyang legs pa byung ngo gsungs /

tshes bcu drug la rgyal dbang mchog sprul rin po che'i zhabs brtan du dmigs gzhung nas rgyu yon sbyar te gzims chung bka' gdams 'khyil du yongs 'dzin rje zhal snga nas dang /
sku'i phu bo dam pa dka' ldan chos 'khor gling gi mkhan po /
grwa tshang pa /
mgon khang pa bcas dge 'dun lnga bcu skor gyi tshogs dbur phebs nas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgo nas zhi rgyas dbang gsum gyi sbyin sreg dang /
chos skyong yongs rdzogs kyi bskang ba dang 'dod khams dbang phyug ma'i sger bskang bcas nyin drug gi ring bsgrub pa mdzad cing yon dang bsnyen bskur gzabs /
tshes nyer gnyis la 'bras spungs blo gsal gling /
bde yangs /
sngags pa bcas so so nas rgyal dbang mchog la legs 'bul dang bstun rje nyid la'ang dngos 'bul bstar /
bkra shis sgo mang grwa tshang nas rgyal dbang rin po cher legs 'bul dang bstun rje nyid la'ang dkar spro dang bcas dngos 'bul bteg /
gnas chung sgra dbyangs gling ba'i sku rten pa grwa spyi dang /
snye thang rab stod /
lha rtse 'og min gling bcas so so nas gong mtshungs thog dngos 'byor gyi mchod sprin spros /
bka' blon dga' bzhi gung gtsang du phebs rgyur phyag mdud gnang cha bcas thon phyag stsal /
tshes nyer bzhi'i nyin rgyal dbang mchog sprul rin po cher rje tsong kha pa chen po'i rnam thar dad pa'i 'jug ngogs kyi ljags lung dang /
de'i phyi nyin byabs khrus /
'jam dkar gyi rjes gnang /
nyer brgyad dang gnam gang nyin chos rgyal nang sgrub kyi rjes gnang dang /
rje tsong kha pa chen po'i gsung 'bum gyi ljags lung 'bul ba'i dbu tshugs /
rgyal dbang sku 'phreng na rim gyi thugs dam nang rten rnams rim bzhin mjal ba gnang nas snyan shal phul te thugs dmigs mdzad /
snga phyir ser sogs kyi grwa pa brgya dang bcu gnyis bsnyen rdzogs bsgrubs /
zla ba brgyad pa'i tshes gcig nas bzung nyin gsum gyi bar gzhung sa nas chab bzhugs dkar spro bteg cing phar yang bla brang nas dkar spro bstabs /
tshes gnyis kyi nyin rgyal dbang mchog nas rje bla ma mchog tshoms chen du spyan drangs te gsol ston rgyas pa'i thog dngul bre chen brgya dang lnga sogs kyi dngos 'bul gtos che ba dang bcas rnam rgyal grwa tshang pas tshe chog mdzad pa'i sgo nas zhabs pad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du brtan pa'i rten 'brel bsgrigs /
po ta la'i rtse drung drag zhan 'bring gsum spyi nas dngos 'bul bteg /
phyag mdzod chen mor yang dgu tshan nyer lnga bcas stsal /
tshes gsum @# / /
gyi nyin rgyal dbang rin po cher lha mo'i rjes gnang phul /
rtse'i drung 'khor drag 'bring tshang mas sger mjal zhus /
mal dro gling stod pa dbang phyug rab brtan gyis gzims chung zhabs brtan phul /
tshes lnga'i nyin de mo sprul pa'i sku rin po che nas spyan drangs pa ltar ban gtsang pa rnams dang /
rme ru /
bzhi sde'i ser sbreng dang bcas thog mar 'du khang du phebs thog dkar spro dang dngul rdo tshad bco lnga sogs kyi dngos 'bul bteg /
ban gtsang spyi so dang bla ma dge 'dun bde chen /
zham ring pa spyi bcas nas dngos 'bul bteg /
de nas dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgo nas gtsug lag khang rten dang brten par bcas pa la rab gnas mdzad par yon kyang gzabs /
tshogs pas zhus ngor 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma'i mngon rtogs kyi ljags lung dang /
rab ston mang ja'i thog grwa rer 'gyed bsod btags /
dngul srang re bcas stsal /
de rjes 'du khang gtsang khang sogs la rten gzigs su phebs nas rten rnams la snyan shal /
mgon khang du spyan gzigs bcas phul /
gsol tshigs thog no mon han de mo sprul pa'i sku dang zhi ba bzang po'i sprul sku bcas rje bla ma mchog gi sku mdun du bzhugs te gsung gleng 'phel bar mdzad /
lha ldan du rten gzigs la phebs nas po ta lar phyag phebs /

rta dbang sprul skus kyang sger mjal zhus /

byang chub lcog dang btsun mo tshal /
tsher gseb dgon /
bkra shis ljongs rnams nas kyang dngos 'byor gyi mchod sprin sgros /
de skabs rje ngag dbang byams pa'i sprul pa'i sku rin po che'i brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs gsar rtsom rnams kyi lung stsal /
sprul pa'i sku yab yum dang bcas par legs skyes kyang bstar /
ser 'bras dge gsum dang /

snam bu 'ga' re bcas bzhes shing /
de phyin slog par mdzad /

tshes bdun gyi nyin la mo chos skyong chen po sku phebs nas yab sras gnyis zhabs pad yun ring du brtan pa'i rten 'brel bsgrigs /

gdugs dkar lha so bdun ma'i dbang /

'jam dbyangs nag po /

'jam dbyangs smra seng bcas kyi rjes gnang dang rgyan 'jug gnyis kyi lung phul /

rgyud smad pa dang /
se ra rtse /
ra kha brag sogs kyi dge 'dun lnga brgya skor gyis zhus ngor 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma'i mngon rtogs dang gdugs dkar /
lam gtso /
zhabs brtan gsol 'debs rnams kyi ljags lung /
la mo chos rje sku rten pa nas zhus ngor sgra mi snyan pa'i tshe sgrub kyi lung dang tshe dbang /
bka' blon thon pas zhus ngor ser skya sum brgya skor la grub rgyal lugs kyi tshe dbang /
rgyud stong bla ma dbu mdzad kyis zhus ngor dge 'dun brgya skor la bla mchod bde stong dbyer med ma'i khrid lung /
'bras spungs sgo mang bla ma sogs sum cu skor la r+wa lugs 'jigs byed zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rjes gnang /
mchod dpon mkhan po'i ri khrod pa rnams kyis zhus ngor byang chub lam gyi sgron ma dang /
sham+b+ha la'i smon tshig bka' rtsom ma'i ljags lung /
bde chen sprul skur 'jam dbyangs dkar po'i rjes gnang /

de'i sbyin sreg bya tshul /
bca' yi ge gsar zhus kyi lung /
rnam rgyal grwa tshang tshogs yongs la tshe rta zung 'brel gyi dbang dang bde mchog lU i pa'i bdag mdun bum gsum sogs cho ga yongs rdzogs kyi lung dang dus 'khor chog grwa pa rnams la bka' rtsom gras dus 'khor gyi zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya tshul gyi lung stsal te so so'i yid kyi 'dod pa 'jo bar mdzad /
dga' ldan pa brgya drug cu re gcig bsnyen rdzogs bsgrubs /
tshes dgu'i nyin rnam rgyal grwa tshang pa ngag dbang blo bzang gis rgyu yon sbyang nas dge 'dun bcu skor gyis gser gdung chen mo'i sku mdun du dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi gsung chog mdzad pa'i mdun bskyed thog rgyal ba yab sras gnyis spyan drangs te zhabs brtan phul /
gzhung nas gong ma chen po'i 'khrungs skar dang bstun /
ser 'bras dge gsum tsho bsdus dge 'dun sum brgyas zhabs brtan bsgrub pa dang mu mthud du bla brang nas kyang nyin gsum gyi ring bsgrubs par mchog sprul rin po cher 'bul ba dang dge 'dun rnams la 'gyed gnang /
tshes bco lnga'i nyin po ta la dang lha lngan bcas kyi rten gtso rnams la stong mchod brgya mchod sogs phul /
tshes bcu bdun la gzhungs nas rje bla ma mchog tshoms chen du spyan drangs nas gsol ston rgyas pa'i thog phebs rdzongs su dngul bre chen lnga bcu /

mdo sngags rig @# / /
gnas mtha' dag la gsan sbyong phul du phyin pa mdzad de sku gong ma lta bu'i mkhas tshul bzhes dgos pa'i gsol 'debs nan tan du mdzad pas zhal bzhes bzang po gnang /
gsol tshigs rgyab la rgyal dbang mchog sprul rin po che la tshe dbang brgya rtsa 'bul ba mdzod /
tshes nyer gnyis la rgyal dbang mchog nas rje bla ma nyid gsol tshigs steng gdan drangs nas maN+Dal sogs dngos 'bul dang bcas zhabs pad srid mthang brtan cing gdul bya rnams byang grol gyi lam la 'god pa dang /
slar yang myur ba nyid du zhal dkyil mjal nas zab chos kyi rim pa zhus chog pa bcas kyi gsol 'debs mdzad /
'di skabs gzhung nas zhabs tog bsnyen bkur bkur gzos phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par mdzad do / /
de ltar gangs ri'i mgon po rgyal dbang mchog gi sprul pa'i sku rin po cher dge tshul gyi sdom pa phul te thub bstan rin po che'i rtsa ba ni tshugs /

mchod @# / /
tshogs rgya chen po bshams shing 'dzum lang sa skyong gis phul ba'i rte de yang spyan gzigs su bstar nas chog rogs pa dang bcas chos skyong dregs pa lcam sring la bskang 'phrin rgyas pa mdzad /
bkra shis rtse'i lcam 'brug chos 'dzom nas legs skyes bstar bar mjal kha ja gral bka' dri gnang /

wA ra Na si /
da lta chu klung phal su zhes pa nai rany+dza na yin pa bcas gnas chen de dag rnams su mchod 'bul gyi ched 'brong rtse drung ram pa chos mdzad blo bzang tshe ring dang gzhan ma gsum bcas glo bo brgyud rdzong sta gnang bar /

da bcol 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i rten du mthun rdzas spyan gzigs zang zing gi mchod pa rgya che ba bcas bstar bas @# / /
chos skyong chen po yang dgyes pa'i rnam 'gyur mdzad /
de'i phyi nyin chos rje sku rten par thon phyag gnang cha gzabs /
bkra shis rtse'i sde ba tshe dbang ngo g.yog la thon phyag dang lha mor snyan shal dang tshon sna lnga 'bul rgyu gnang /
hal ha khu be gung gi hong tha'i ji bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa zhu 'dod yod kyang gong ma chen pos pha shul bur 'jags pa'i las don byed dgos yod par brten stabs mi 'grig par 'dug pas dge tshul gyi sdom pa zhig gnang dgos zhes zhus par /
tha'i ji rang khyim gyi nyes dmigs mthong pas rab tu 'byung 'dod pa shin tu legs kyang rgyal po dang pha ma gnyis las gnang ba ma thob cing /
skra dang kha sbu ma bregs pa dang| gos ngur smrig ma bgos bar dge tshul gyi sdom pa len pa sangs rgyas kyis ma gnang bas /
de bas yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen bsgrubs te tshul bzhin bsrung na khe che la nyen chung ba yin zhes gsungs nas yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen gyi sdem pa stsal te mi tshangs spyod ma gtogs pa'i yan lag lnga la sogs pa bslab bya rnams srog dang bsngos te bsrung dgos pa'i bka' phebs /
tha'i ji rang gis pha khe sbas gung sdig tshan che ba yod pas de'i sgrib sbyong du smon tshig sho lo ka gcig bka' rtsom zhus pa ltar stsal /
tshes nyer drug gi nyin dge bskos chen mo nas zhus ngor 'dus pa'i sde la rje rang nyid kyi gsung 'bum gyi ljags lung sngar gyi mu nas rim bzhin stsol ba'i dbu tshugs /
snga phyir rgyud smad pa sogs sum cu bsnyen rdzogs dang /
lnga dge tshul bsgrubs /
zla ba bdun pa'i nang du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo dang mi la'i rnam mgur gyi par brkos grub par phyag nas dang /
sngags grwa nas zhus ngor sngags pa tshogs yongs dang skyid grong bla ma ye shes rgyal mtshan ri khrod pa bcas par bde mchog gi rgyud 'grel sbas don kun gsal gyi bshad lung gnang bar sngags pa bla spyi nas gtang rag gi yon kyang gzabs /
dam can chos kyi rgyal por gtang rag gi bskang gso gnang /
tshes bco brgyad kyi nyin dge bskos dka' chen blo bzang bstan 'dzin gyis zhus ngor 'dus tshogs la 'dul ba'i gzhung lugs kyi bshad pa la lam rim gyis brgyan pa nyin bzhi'i ring gnang ste sems bskyed kyi tshe ga yang mdzad /
zla ba brgyad pa'i tshes gnyis nas bcu'i bar dus 'khor chog grwa ba rnams nas zhus ngor gzims chung nyi 'od du khong rnams kyi thog skyid grong bla ma ye shes rgyal mtshan /
dge slong spong ba pa rnams dang bcas pa la dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nyi zla gza' skar sogs 'jig rten khams kyi rnam gzhag dang /
nang skyes bu'i rtsa rlung thig le'i gnas lugs /

mdzad /
tshes bcu drug gi nyin sngon du skyid grong bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen ye shes rgyal mtshan nas yang yang gsol ba btab pa bzhin khong rang rnams dang /
phyag mdzod chen mo /
zhal snga nas bzhi /
rgyud grwa'i 'grel dpon pa sogs la rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa bzhi sbrags 'chad pa'i dbu tshugs /
nyin re bzhin 'grel gtor 'bul ba sogs phyag len bzhin mdzad cing legs par bshad pa mtha' yas pas brgyan te stsol bar mdzad /
don gnyer pa bco lnga bsnyen rdzogs bsgrubs /
zla ba dgu pa'i tshes gcig nas bzung nyin kha shas kyi ring rgyud stod smad sogs phyogs 'dus bsgrub bya brgya dang lnga bsnyen rdzogs bsgrubs /
tshes bco lnga la sku khams cung zad mi dwangs pa'i tshul bstan par sman gyi 'phrod bzhes dang /
sngags khang du mgon po zhal bzhi par mchod gtor rgya chen po dang bcas bskang 'phrin mdzad bcug /
dkyil khang gi lcam sring la'ang snyan shal phul te 'phrin bcol mdzad pas ma 'gyang bar dwangs /
tshes bcu drug gi nyin 'grel pa bzhi sbrags kyi bshad lung rdzogs par grub ste rje bla ma nyid rigs thams cad kyi bdag por bzhengs pa la rdo rje slob ma rnams kyis phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya chen pos mnyes par byas pa'i mthar sngon byung la rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje chos la rgyud gtad pa dang mtshungs par 'grel pa'i dbang bskur ba yang phyag len bzhin mdzad de chos nyan pa po mtha' dag zab lam rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi dga' ston la 'god par mdzad do / /

gsol tshigs kyi thog dpon slob tshang mar 'grel ston gnang zhing chos rgyal dang zhal bzhi par gtang rag gi bskang gso dang kha btags dngul 'gyed bcas stsal /
tshes bco brgyad nas bzung nyi ma bdun gyi ring mgon po zhal dang lcam sring gi bskang gso mdzad /
tshes nyer drug la skyid grong bla ma ngo g.yog la gnang cha sbam mtho ba dang bcas thon phyag gnang zhing bstan pa 'dzin skyong gnang dgos pa'i bka' yang phebs /
rdzong kha mi tshan gyi grwa rigs ye shes chos 'phel sogs kyis zhus ngor bla ma nyid kyi rtogs brjod gsol 'debs bka' rtsom gnang pa'i ljags lung stsal /
bsgrub bya brgya dang lnga bsnyen rdzogs bsgrubs /

dung mtsho /

tshes bcu drug gi nyin stag mo mi tshan gyi grwa rigs dge slong blo bzang bsam gtan gyis zhus ngor dpal mgon phyag bzhi pa'i mngon rtogs spyan 'dren nas mnga' gsol shis brjod sogs gtor chog rgyas shing cha tshang ba'i bka' rtsom gnang /

bzhugs 'bol /
bzang gos yug kha shas dang| shel gyi yol go sogs kyi gnang rten 'bul rgyu stsal ba 'byor par dgyes pa chen pos bzhes nas sku thang rnams la mchod 'bul dang bcas gong ma chen po zhabs bad yun ring brtan cing cha ba srid dar zhing rgyas pa'i thugs smon rgya cher mdzad /

bka' @# / /
shag lhan rgyas bcas nas phyi lo rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen por sa zla'i dus chen dang bstun thugs rdzogs 'bul ba dang /
bka' dbang rjes gnang sogs stsol bar zla ba gnyis pa'i nang du dbus phyogs su chibs bsgyur gnang dgos tshul gyi zhu yig 'byor pa bzhin bka' lan kyang 'phral 'bul gnang /
tshes bcu gsum la rgya gar b+hang+ga la'i sa skyong b+ha ra sa he ba la mtshams 'dri dang /
yul de'i gnas chen khag la mchod 'bul byed mi gtong ba mdzad /
gnam gang la bstan pa'i gsal byed tsha kan no mon han dpon g.yog nyis brgya brgyal tsam mjal khar 'byor bar no mon han sku rkyang la mtshams khongs mjal kha gnang /
zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i tshes gcig nas bzung nyin gnyis kyi ring dbang dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg mdzad de sku mtsham sgrol /
